text.value: Quel est le Motif de décès
Information sur le déces

bind.calculate: concat(concat( /death_report/patient_age_in_years , if( /death_report/patient_age_in_years =1,' an et ',' ans et ')),concat( /death_report/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /death_report/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' mois',' mois')))

concat(concat( /death_report/patient_age_in_years , if( /death_report/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')),concat( /death_report/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /death_report/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')))

if( /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'male' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'homme' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'Homme', 'Male', if( /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'female' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'femme' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'Femme', 'Female', ''))

if( /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'male' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'homme' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'Homme', 'Masculin', if( /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'female' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'femme' or /death_report/inputs/contact/sex = 'Femme', 'Féminin', ''))
